channel.title: Write-Up on AlrikRr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Write-Up on AlrikRr's Blog

item.title: Flag #5 - Punk Down
item.description: Okay for this one I don’t have the reference but I managed to found it by accident ! It’s actually the second one I found during my journey. Punk Guy I was playing around the place and speak to this Punk Guy right here During the conversation, I found the flag by accident by pressing the Down Button Flag 5 The flag is FLAG-KLJV490uhkEJF28

item.title: Flag #1 - Welcome
item.description: Hello everyone ! It’s been a while since my last post but I’m still alive no worries üòÅ Today I’m gonna post some write-up for the NorthSec 2021 Badge CTF ! I purchase the badge last year and din’t have time to play with it so here I am ! It’s actually my first CTF Badge and I hope im going to fine all the flags ! Device Here is a full spec of the nsec badge : available here

item.title: Bellatrix - easy
item.description: NMAP Okay let’s start with the beginning ! sudo nmap -A -sS bellatrix.vuln As we can see, there are two main services : PORT Status Banner 22 OPEN OpenSSH 8.3p1 80 OPEN Apache http 2.4.46 Web Application The web application is using the http port 80. This page is a static html with a gif and a strange text with a .php at the end. Unfortunatle, the page http://192.168.1.166/ikilledsiriusblack[...]ikilledsiriusblack.php is FORBIDEN.

item.title: Y0usef - easy
item.description: LEVEL : Easy TIME SPEND : 1h30 LINK : y0usef 1 NMAP Welcome to a new writeup vulnhub. Let’s start with an nmap to list the services open on the machine. sudo nmap -A -p- -Pn -T 5 yousef.vuln As we can see, there are two main services : PORT Status Banner 22 OPEN OpenSSH 6.6.1p1 80 OPEN Apache http 2.4.10 Let’s check the HTTP service. Web Application On the index page there is nothing interesting.
